channel.title: Easily on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Easily on Docs

item.title: Cats with a short life span often have these six characteristics.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A cat’s lifespan depends on many factors, but they all manifest themselves physically. Generally, cats with short life span tend to have these 6 characteristics, hopefully your cat will have none of them. Overweight In both humans and cats, obesity can lead to many diseases. For example, diabetes, heart disease and other problems. How can you tell if your cat is overweight? You can touch your cat near the chest with your hand, and if you can’t feel the ribs, then it can be said to be obese.
